modName: The Pleasant Lair - Warm and comfortable house
summary: This mod adds a new home called \"The Pleasant Lair\" . It is designed for a Vampire character. You can find a torture victim in the cave wich you can feed on as much as you want. She is completly compelled by the vampire\'s seduction.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/524817titre.png[/img][/Center]
[center][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/115972flamme.png[/img][/Center]

[b]Description[/b]
Hello everyone. This is my first mod and my first building on that game. I decided to build a big house with a lots of bed, a seller, crafting items and everything needed to improve my game experience. There is even a misc seller if you need to sell your useless stuff.

You can find the building in Whiterun near the entrance (at the right).

The design is kinda Nordic and very cozy and pleasant to live in. 
[s]There is a Bard named Greta but she doesn\'t sing yet, I will try to fix this asap. [/s]
I removed the Bard, I will try to make him/her work after christmas.

Update 1.2 : I added a new brighter version of the house for those who have really dark presets, I hope it will be bright enough for you. Juste ask if it\'s still not enough. The slave will now never counter attack you but will flee inside her cage. She will never go out of her cage (at least not on her will, if you push her it\'s a different problem...)

[b]Installation[/b]
Install the mod with NMM, no extension needed, or extract the content of the .rar file into your Skyrim\'s Data folder (and don\'t forget to activate it with your launcher).

[b]Review[/b] :
[center][youtube]EdpDq4gn5n8[/youtube][/center]
[center]Thank you [url=www.youtube.com/user/MrBiggenGaming]MrBiggenGaming[/url] ![/center]

PS : sorry for my english, i\'m French
author: JohnAzerty
